item.text: Jeremiah finished telling all the people all these things the Lord their God had sent him to tell them.

Then Azariah son of Hoshaiah, Johanan son of Kareah, and other arrogant men said to Jeremiah, “You are telling a lie! The Lord our God did not send you to tell us, ‘You must not go to Egypt and settle there.’

<st data-num="03588" class="">But</st> <st data-num="01263" class="">Baruch</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05374" class="">Neriah</st> is <st data-num="05496" class="">stirring</st> you <st data-num="05496" class="">up</st> against us.<n id="1" /> He <st data-num="04616" class="">wants</st> to <st data-num="05414" class="">hand</st> us <st data-num="03027" class="">over to</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="03778" class="">Babylonians</st><n id="3" /> so that they will <st data-num="04191" class="">kill</st> us or <st data-num="01540" class="">carry</st> us <st data-num="01540" class="">off into exile</st> in <st data-num="0894" class="">Babylon</st>.”
So Johanan son of Kareah, all the army officers, and all the rest of the people did not obey the Lord’s command to stay in the land of Judah.

Instead <st data-num="03110" class="">Johanan</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="07143" class="">Kareah</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="02428" class="">army</st> <st data-num="08269" class="">officers</st> <st data-num="03947" class="">led off</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="03063" class="">Judean</st> <st data-num="07611" class="">remnant</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> had <st data-num="07725" class="">come back</st> to <st data-num="01481" class="">live</st> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st> from <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st> <st data-num="0834 08033">where</st> they had been <st data-num="05080" class="">scattered</st>.<n id="1" />

They also led off <st data-num="03605 05315">all</st> the <st data-num="01397" class="">men</st>, <st data-num="0802" class="">women</st>, <st data-num="02945" class="">children</st>, and <st data-num="04428" class="">royal</st> <st data-num="01323" class="">princesses</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="05018" class="">Nebuzaradan</st>, the <st data-num="07227" class="">captain</st> of the royal <st data-num="02876" class="">guard</st>, had <st data-num="03240" class="">left</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> <st data-num="01436" class="">Gedaliah</st>,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0296" class="">Ahikam</st> and <st data-num="01121" class="">grandson</st> of <st data-num="08227" class="">Shaphan</st>; this included the <st data-num="05030" class="">prophet</st> <st data-num="03414" class="">Jeremiah</st> and <st data-num="01263" class="">Baruch</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05374" class="">Neriah</st>.
They went on to Egypt because they refused to obey the Lord, and came to Tahpanhes.
At Tahpanhes the Lord’s message came to Jeremiah:

“<st data-num="03947 03027">Take</st> some <st data-num="01419" class="">large</st> <st data-num="068" class="">stones</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="02934" class="">bury</st> them in the <st data-num="04423" class="">mortar</st> of the <st data-num="04404 0834">clay pavement</st><n id="2" /> at the <st data-num="06607" class="">entrance</st> of <st data-num="06547" class="">Pharaoh’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">residence</st><n id="3" /> here in <st data-num="08471" class="">Tahpanhes</st>. Do it while the <st data-num="0582" class="">people</st> of <st data-num="03064" class="">Judah</st> present there <st data-num="05869" class="">are watching</st>.<n id="4" />

Then tell them, ‘The Lord of Heaven’s Armies, the God of Israel, says, “I will bring my servant King Nebuchadnezzar of Babylon. I will set his throne over these stones that I have buried. He will pitch his royal tent over them.

He will <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> and <st data-num="05221" class="">attack</st> <st data-num="0776 04714">Egypt</st>. Those <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> are destined to <st data-num="04194" class="">die of disease</st> will <st data-num="04194" class="">die of disease</st>. Those <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> are destined to be <st data-num="07628" class="">carried off into exile</st> will be <st data-num="07628" class="">carried off into exile</st>. Those <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> are destined to <st data-num="02719" class="">die in war</st> will <st data-num="02719" class="">die in war</st>.<n id="1" />

He will <st data-num="03341" class="">set</st> <st data-num="0784" class="">fire</st><n id="1" /> to the <st data-num="01004" class="">temples</st> of the <st data-num="0430" class="">gods</st> of <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st>. He will <st data-num="08313" class="">burn</st> their gods or <st data-num="07617" class="">carry</st> them <st data-num="07617" class="">off as captives</st>.<n id="2" /> He will <st data-num="05844" class="">pick</st> <st data-num="0776 04714">Egypt</st> <st data-num="05844" class="">clean</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="07462" class="">shepherd</st> <st data-num="05844" class="">picks the lice</st> from his <st data-num="0899" class="">clothing</st>.<n id="3" /> He will <st data-num="03318" class="">leave</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st> <st data-num="07965" class="">unharmed</st>.<n id="4" />
He will demolish the sacred pillars in the temple of the sun in Egypt and will burn down the temples of the gods of Egypt.”’”
